Reviews.Content: stayed hotel july 2011 booked arrived lobby totally shocked family prostitutes afraid stay 6th floor helped luggage arrived nice huge clean bathroom cheap 160 aed day breakfast location 15 minutes walk metro station metro station 5 minutes walk tried breakfast day nice wifi expensive hotel bought 15 minutes voucher username password 5 aed stay recommend people families
